Literature.Title: Optimization of globomycin analogs as novel gram-negative antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Garland K, Pantua H, Braun MG, Burdick DJ, Castanedo GM, Chen YC, Cheng YX, Cheong JW, Daniels B, Deshmukh G, Gibbons P, Gloor SL, Hua R, Labadie S, Liu X, Pastor R, Stivala C, Xu M, Xu Y, Zheng H, Kapadia SB, Hanan EJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CFT073(MIC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli CFT073imp4213(MIC=0.048µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=50µM),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047(MIC=6.3µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=18µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=100µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=18µM),Jurkat cancer cells(EC50=>100µM)
